T02D1329:283b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1329:283b-5: mngon sum rdo rje 'dzin mdzad pa //
T02D1329:283b-6: rdo rje slob dpon phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1329:283b-7: de yi yongs su bor ba'i ro //
T02D1329:283b-8: 'dus byas cho ga bshad par bya //
T02D1329:283b-9: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02D1329:283b-10: ma shes par ni bsregs gyur na //
T02D1329:283b-11: mchod rten bshig pa lta bur 'gyur //
T02D1329:283b-12: gang yang bsod nams ma yin zhes //
T02D1329:284a-2: de rnams legs par 'dus bya ste //
T02D1329:284a-3: gzhan du na ni dmyal bar ltung //
T02D1329:284a-4: rdo rje slob dpon 'ga' zhig ni //
T02D1329:284a-5: shi ste ro ru gyur nas kyang //
T02D1329:284a-7: dur khrod du ni gzhug par bya //
T02D1329:284a-8: de nas gnas pa'i sa yi ni //
T02D1329:284a-9: dag byed sngags kyis 'dus byas te //
T02D1329:284a-10: slar yang cho ga bzhin bsgrub pa //
T02D1329:284a-11: dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya //
T02D1329:284a-12: de yi gtso bo de nyid kyis //
T02D1329:284a-13: dbang bskur lnga ni sbyin par bya //
T02D1329:284a-14: rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur yang //
T02D1329:284a-15: phyi nas cho ga mkhas pas sbyin //
T02D1329:284a-16: me tog spos la sogs pas mchod //
T02D1329:284a-17: yang dag mchod nas bstod par bya //
T02D1329:284a-18: mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che //
T02D1329:284a-19: rdo rje dbyings ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02D1329:284a-20: de ltar mchod cing bstod nas kyang //
T02D1329:284a-21: badzra mu: zhes rab brjod de //
T02D1329:284a-22: 'gro ba'i bla ma rang gnas su //
T02D1329:284a-23: gshegs su gsol bar bsam par bya //
T02D1329:284a-24: ji skad gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid ldan //
T02D1329:284a-25: zhi ba la sogs yang na ni //
T02D1329:284a-26: las kun byed pa'i thab khung du //
T02D1329:284a-27: lte bar bgegs dgra'i mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1329:284a-28: sngags kyis sbar ba'i me nang du //
T02D1329:284a-29: mthe'u chung khru gang tshad kyi shing //
T02D1329:284a-30: dbul zhing mar dkar blugs par bya //
T02D1329:284a-31: de la 'di ni me sbar ba'i sngags so //
T02D1329:284a-32: aom dzv'a la dzv'a la h'um /
T02D1329:284a-33: ku sha shar phyogs rtse bstan nas //
T02D1329:284a-34: h'um bzlas g-yas skor nyid du dgram //
T02D1329:284a-35: de bzhin du ni sngar gyi me //
T02D1329:284a-36: thab khung ku sha dbul bar bya //
T02D1329:284a-37: thab khung bdag med par dmigs la //
T02D1329:284a-38: ram skyes zhi ba bsam par bya //
T02D1329:284a-39: dkar po zhal ras dkar ba dang //
T02D1329:284a-40: g-yas g-yon sngo dang dmar ba'o //
T02D1329:284a-41: sbom thung ral ba'i cod pa can //
T02D1329:284a-42: g-yon pa spyi blugs be con bsnams //
T02D1329:284a-44: padma ra skyes mi dkyil du //
T02D1329:284a-45: me lha bzhugs par bltas nas kyang //
T02D1329:284a-46: ye shes me lha spyan drang bya //
T02D1329:284a-47: de la 'di ni me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so //
T02D1329:284a-48: aom ae hye hi ma h'a bh'u ta de ba ri shi dvi dza sa ta ma /
T02D1329:284a-49: gri hi hv'a gu ti ma h'a ra aasmim sanni hi to bha b'a /
T02D1329:284a-50: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pas /
T02D1329:284b-0: spyan drangs la sogs rim nyid @284b kyis //
T02D1329:284b-1: mchod yon zhal bsil sogs phul nas //
T02D1329:284b-2: gcig nyid dam tshig la gzhug go //
T02D1329:284b-3: lha yi sku ru 'khrungs pa yi //
T02D1329:284b-4: me lha'i lce la ram bkod de //
T02D1329:284b-5: dgang blugs phul te phyi nas ni //
T02D1329:284b-6: mkhas pas gsang sngags 'di bsngags so //
T02D1329:284b-8: aom aagna ye a'a d'i pya a'a d'i pya aa
T02D1329:284b-9: bi sha ma h'a shri ye ha bya ka bya
T02D1329:284b-10: b'a ha n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1329:284b-12: me tog la sogs mchod par bya //
T02D1329:284b-13: bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lha yi sku //
T02D1329:284b-14: me yi thugs kar bsgom par bya //
T02D1329:284b-15: mchod pa dam pa sngon 'gro ba //
T02D1329:284b-16: yon chab zhabs bsel la sogs dbul //
T02D1329:284b-17: de phyir mar gyi dgang blugs rnams //
T02D1329:284b-18: bdud rtsir bsams nas dbul bar bya //
T02D1329:284b-19: shi ba'i ro la dri zhim chus //
T02D1329:284b-20: khrus gsol mar gyis byugs pa ni //
T02D1329:284b-21: nya gro dha sogs yam shing la //
T02D1329:284b-22: sngags 'di brjod cing bsreg par bya //
T02D1329:284b-23: aom a'a: badzra sa tva aa mu kam badzra tsarya su kh'a ba ti pra p'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1329:284b-26: so rtsi 'dag rdzas byed pa dbul //
T02D1329:284b-27: dril bu rab tu dkrol nas su //
T02D1329:284b-28: bstod pa dang ni mchod pa bya //
T02D1329:284b-29: de nas sngags pa mnyam gzhag pas //
T02D1329:284b-30: thugs kar me tog thal sbyar te //
T02D1329:284b-31: dmar sogs skyon rnams zhi ba'i phyir //
T02D1329:284b-32: bzod par gsol zhes yang dag brjod //
T02D1329:284b-33: gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas //
T02D1329:284b-34: lhag pa ma tshang gang byas pa //
T02D1329:284b-35: gang yang lus can skyabs gyur pa'i //
T02D1329:284b-36: dpal ldan de nyid kyis bzod mdzod //
T02D1329:284b-37: gus pas bzod pa gsol ba'i mthar //
T02D1329:284b-38: rang gi gnang ba bsgom par bya //
T02D1329:284b-39: yi ge brgya pa brjod nas kyang //
T02D1329:284b-40: me lha mnga' bdag gshegs su gsol //
T02D1329:284b-41: nyi ma de yang gnyis pa la //
T02D1329:284b-42: 'o mas me la blugs byas nas //
T02D1329:284b-43: 'bad pas rus bu kun btus te //
T02D1329:284b-44: gtsang ma'i snod du bcangs byas nas //
T02D1329:284b-45: de nas rus bu btus pa rnams //
T02D1329:284b-46: mkhas pas ba yi 'o mas bkru //
T02D1329:284b-47: 'jim pa bsres nas s'a tstsha gdab //
T02D1329:284b-48: snying po mchod rten brtsig par bya //
T02D1329:284b-49: de la sku gdung rgyal po'i mchod rten brtsigs //
T02D1329:284b-50: sangs rgyas mtha' yas mchog gis byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1329:285a-1: snod du legs par bcangs byas nas //
T02D1329:285a-2: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs rim par rab gnas mdzad //
T02D1329:285a-3: changs pa la sogs rnams kyang gus pas 'dud //
T02D1329:285a-4: de bas skye bo bshes gnyen spyan sngar 'dud //
T02D1329:285a-5: byang chub cho ga yis ni khas 'ches pas //
T02D1329:285a-6: de ni mchod rten rgyas pa chen po ste //
T02D1329:285a-7: don che'i rgyu ru gus pas yang dag mchod //
T02D1329:285a-8: dur khrod mchod rten byas pas ri bo can las khyad par 'phags pa de yis ni //
T02D1329:285a-9: dge ba gang zhig bsags pa de yis 'gro ba gsum du son pa'i skye bo rnams //
T02D1329:285a-10: dngos po dgra sogs btul ba'i shes rab mchog mnga' thugs rje skye ba mchog tu brtse //
T02D1329:285a-11: 'jig rten gsum gtsug dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1329:285a-12: ring por mi thogs 'grub par shog / ro bsreg
T02D1329:285a-13: pa dge slong ta th'a ga ta rakshi tas mdzad
T02D1329:285a-15: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /
